Name: Maskonauts: Chat'Attack
About the game: Shoot and loot the content of your favorite Twitch channels! Get in your Maskopod and play in real time with Twitch chats activities! Survive waves of texts, Emoticodes and enemies. Collect bonuses and try to defeat the Blockbossters and save the Maskotios! Everything you type in the chat appear in the game! üé≤ Each channel generates a game level and its content with a unique boss, enemies combination, musics and environment colors. üí™ The number of spectators and the intensity of the exchanges on the chat change the difficulty of the levels. High activity means more obstacles and enemies, but also more bonuses to collect! üéÅ Specific characters and emojis bring up bonuses: a red heart emoji brings up a ‚ù§Ô∏è which restores energy, the '!' and '?' make random bonuses appear... And there are plenty of others to discover! üíé Collect Emogems, reach high scores and beat bosses quickly to earn more Maskoins. üõ†Ô∏è Use your Maskoins to unlock upgrades and new Maskopods with special weapons and statistics. üëæ Survive all 10 waves on a channel and beat it's Blockbosster to get a boss badge, the ultimate Maskonauts reward. üí¨ Interact in the chat to influence the games of other players just as they influence yours! ‚≠ê Connect to your Twitch account to play with your favorite channels and unlock more features! üñ•Ô∏è The game behaves like a PC widget, making it easier to interact with Twitch chats during games. Menu languages: English, French Supported Twitch text message characters and symbols: Latin, Cyrillic, Bengali, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Simplified Chinese and Mandarin. Maskonauts: Chat'Attack does not require a Twitch account to play. Maskonauts: Chat'Attack is a game that allows you to read and interact with Twitch channels using official Twitch API. We don't share any personal data. An internet connexion is required to use Maskonauts: Chat'Attack. Any costs relating to this connexion are at your expense.
